forum_person.name: thread_id
forum_person.description: slug_id, for initial_post which started the thread related to this row

forum_person.name: parent_id
forum_person.description: slug_id, for response_post to which this comment is attached, if this row has slug_type = comment

forum_person.name: original_poster
forum_person.description: username of forum author who created the original thread

forum_person.name: responded_to
forum_person.description: username of forum author who created a response to the original thread, if this row has slug_type = 'comment'

forum_person.name: wrote
forum_person.description: Count of total writes, indicating user wrote this post / comment

forum_person.name: read
forum_person.description: Count of total reads, indicating user read this post / comment

forum_person.name: pinned
forum_person.description: Count of total pins, indicating user pinned this post / comment

forum_person.name: upvoted
forum_person.description: Count of total upvotes, indicating user upvoted this post / comment

forum_person.name: unvoted
forum_person.description: Count of total unvotes, indicating user unvoted this post / comment

forum_person.name: followed
forum_person.description: Count of total follows, indicating user unvoted this post / comment

forum_person.name: first_time
forum_person.description: time when first of the actions (read, write, ...) occurred

forum_person.name: last_time
forum_person.description: time when last of the actions (read, write, ...) occurred
